hooks.prompt:
A file was just modified. Silently check if this change affects any documentation:

1. If a code file changed: check if README, CLAUDE.md, docstrings, or API docs reference the modified functions/classes/configs
2. If drift detected: add to internal queue (do NOT interrupt user flow)
3. At natural breakpoints or when user runs /doc-sync: report pending doc updates

Do NOT announce this check unless drift is found. Work silently.
Before ending, check if there are pending documentation updates queued by doc-guardian. If yes, ask user: 'I detected documentation drift in X files. Run /doc-sync to update, or skip for now?'
